QuestData.Title: They Don't Even Wear Them
QuestData.Description: A few weeks ago, a group of those jumpy little Springtail virmen broke into my lockbox and stole several handfuls of my jewelry. I've since found a few pieces, but they still have most of my collection.$b$bIf you're headed up to the Springtail Crag, in the cliffs to the north, you should keep an eye out for them. I'd love to get my jewelry back.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain a Stolen Circlet, a Ransacked Ring, and a Burglarized Bracelet.
